Instruction in the People's Homes--God's servants have a great work to do in addition to preaching in the pulpit. In the work of the ministry 
                                                                           236
there is altogether too much preaching, and too little real teaching the lessons of the Bible. Our ministers should visit the members of the church more than they do, to talk and pray with them. Their hearts need to be drawn out to those in their charge.
